scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n=umi,electron -c=blue,green "cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=sit APP_ROOT=src/render umi dev" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.---- close flex routes ----: ---- 开发关闭动态路由，可选 ----
scripts.flex: concurrently -n=umi,electron -c=blue,green "cross-env closeFlexRoute=true APP_ROOT=src/render umi dev" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.---- 自动根据操作系统平台构建包 electron进程环境变量 electr: ---- 自动根据操作系统平台构建包 ----
scripts.pack: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=prod APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder
scripts.pack:test: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=test APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder
scripts.---- 测试包，关闭自动更新检测 ----: ---- 测试包，关闭自动更新检测 ----
scripts.pack:close-update: npm run electron:build && cross-env  CLOSE_UPDATE=true  YPSHOP_ENV=test APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder
scripts.---- 不同接口环境 WEB_ENV=sit ----: ---- 自动根据操作系统平台构建包 ----
scripts.pack-env-sit: npm run electron:build && cross-env WEB_ENV=sit APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder
scripts.---- 构建三个操作系统平台包 electron-package-all --: ---- 构建三个操作系统平台包 ----
scripts.pack-all: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=sit APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m -w
scripts.pack-all:pre: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=pre APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m -w
scripts.pack-all:prod: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=prod APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m -w
scripts.---- 构建 mac 操作系统平台包 electron-package-mac: ---- 构建 mac 操作系统平台包 ----
scripts.pack-mac: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=sit APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m
scripts.pack-mac:pre: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=pre APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m
scripts.pack-mac:prod: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=prod APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -m
scripts.---- 构建 windows 操作系统平台包 electron-package: ---- 构建 windows 操作系统平台包 ----
scripts.pack-windows: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=sit APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -w
scripts.pack-windows:pre: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=pre APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -w
scripts.pack-windows:prod: npm run electron:build && cross-env YPSHOP_ENV=prod APP_ROOT=src/render umi build && electron-builder -w

manifest.blog: render 进程文件可放在远程服务器加载 🙃
下发电子称放到子进程，尝试修复主进程崩溃导致闪退
